sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Ron Baron Says Tesla Stock Could Rise To $1,500 Per Share: Elon Musk Expects It To Be Worth Even More
feed.summary: Billionaire investor Ron Baron has a bet on Tesla Inc, but it's more of a wager on Elon Musk, the man in the driver's seat. Despite being up big on his investment, he isn't tapping the brakes anytime soon. Baron expects Tesla shares to appreciate close to 1,000% over the next seven years.
